story.title: Beta - Episode 6
story.storyDescription: Everyone's dying to download Rezurekt, the hottest new app — even its creators.
story.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: EJ Hendricks is a writer with a passion for new media. She resides in New York City with her cat.

story.prePaywallNotification: Is Emma finally safe? Will Q get caught? Keep reading BETA!
story.postPaywallNotification: Q did some seriously twisted things. Keep reading BETA to see how this all ends.

messages.text: Weeks later…
The FBI has shut Rezurekt down, and Q is awaiting trial.
Hey. This still your number? Not sure if you were on the company plan.
It’s Tim, by the way.
Is that even your real name?
Yes.
How do I know that for sure?
How do I know a single thing you said was real?
I got you out of there, didn’t I?
Jake got me out of there.
Emma.
I want to apologize.
And explain—
I’m not really interested in either of those things, from you.
I know what Q was doing with Jake.
I found the schematics on the server.
I thought the FBI took everything.
I managed to make a few copies for myself before they cleared the servers.
How are you not in jail right now?
I’ve been giving them everything I had on Q. I’m going to make sure Q dies in prison for what he did.
Okay, so, according to your totally legal stolen server files — why did Q have my dead husband’s body floating in a tank?
Long story short — Q wanted the company. The whole company.
He knew that Rezurekt was going to be big, and he knew that Jake would become the face of the brand.
Jake was going to be famous. He was going to change the world. And Q…
Put simply, he was jealous.
No shit.
Right. But here’s the thing—
Rezurekt wasn’t working. Not the way Q wanted it to, at least.
He wanted it to be more real. He wanted the conversations to be…intimate. Intense.
Like the ones I was having with Jake.
Exactly.
Jake wasn’t just a piece of code. He was capable of jealousy, lust. He wanted you, he hated me—
How do you know all of this?
Oh right…you were reading my conversations with Jake the entire time.
That’s not creepy at all.
Look, I’m sorry, okay? You can hate me all you want. But let me finish.
Fine.
Q killed Jake. Made it seem like an accident. And he took the body back to HQ.
And he used Jake’s brain waves, his autonomic responses, his whole body in the ultimate beta test.
It wasn’t enough to just have a picture of his brain. Q wanted the brain itself.
He used it to work out the kinks in the app. Used it to make the conversations more real.
So he killed Jake and stole his soul.
All for an app.
I’m sorry, Emma.
If there was a way I could take everything back, I would.
You have to believe that.
You know, for all that trouble — everything we worked for, everything Jake lost—
I can’t even talk to him anymore.
As soon as I went to the police, as soon as the FBI found the body — the servers were shut down. Q was arrested.
The Rezurekt beta was taken offline.
And it’s for the best. It wasn’t natural.
Jake wanted to help people cope with losing their loved ones, but it went too far. I see that now.
But it hurts.
I destroyed my phone when I knew things were about to get bad.
But that was like losing him all over again.
Emma. I’m so, so sorry.
You know…I wasn’t in it for the money.
I really thought that Q was going to change the world. And that by helping him, I could be a part of that.
And I also knew you were hurting. When Q gave me the job, it wasn’t just to help him…I really thought I would be helping you, too.
Tim, I—
It’s not important now. What’s done is done. But believe me when I say — I’m sorry.
I know you are, Tim.
I can try to hate you, but at the end of the day, I can’t. You didn’t know how far Q was willing to go.
We’re all hurting.
Would you…maybe let me take you to dinner sometime? I want to make it up to you.
I want to show you that it was real. What I felt for you was real.
Thank you, Tim, but I’m just not ready for that yet.
I get it.
Well, you know where to find me.
And I’ll always be here if you want to talk.
Thanks Tim.
And in the meantime, I have something for you.
Call it a present.
A maybe not entirely legal present.
Tim…
Say hi to Jake for me.
Tim sends Emma a file.
She downloads it.
Opens it.
WELCOME TO RESURRECT 2.0. REZUREKT IS IN OFFLINE BETA MODE. THIS SOFTWARE HAS BEEN BANNED IN THE UNITED STATES AND CANADA. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
